overview: Leera the Soulmate takes place in the distant future in 6900, the humanity has lost all it's faith and love is taken as a poison, Leera(protagonist) wakes up after 4882 years to realize that world has been, she reaches the nearby habitat, and falls in love with a boy, everyone tries to split her apart, Saiman, a voice of help is a friend or foe? The story telltales this awesome love journey.
title: Leera The Soulmate
